professional.description: Clear, authoritative, steady. For tutorials and how-tos.

casual.description: Relaxed, conversational, natural variability. For vlogs and casual talk.

energetic.description: High energy, dynamic, expressive. For product launches and hype content.

educational.description: Measured pace, clear articulation. For step-by-step guides.

storytelling.description: Emotional range, dramatic pauses, warm. For personal stories and motivation.

This just dropped on Cumquat Vibes!
You NEED to see this {topic} design!

title_formulas: I Tried {topic} for 30 Days - Here's What Happened
Stop Making This {topic} Mistake (Do This Instead)
The Truth About {topic} Nobody Talks About
Why {topic} is a Game Changer for {audience}
I Tested {number} {topic} Tools. Only {number} Actually Work.

curiosity_gap: Nobody talks about this, but {topic} completely changed how I {result}.
I found something about {topic} that most people miss entirely.
What if everything you knew about {topic} was wrong?
pattern_interrupt: Wait. Before you scroll... this {topic} tip saved me {time/money}.
Stop. If you're doing {topic} without this, you're making it harder than it needs to be.
I almost didn't make this video about {topic}. But then this happened.
bold_claim: This is the only {topic} video you'll ever need to watch.
{topic} in under 60 seconds. Ready? Let's go.
I'm going to show you {topic} faster than anyone else on YouTube.
personal_story: Three years ago, I knew nothing about {topic}. Today it's my entire business.
Let me tell you about the time {topic} completely changed my perspective.
I made every mistake possible with {topic}. Here's what I learned.
question: Have you ever felt completely lost trying to figure out {topic}?
What's the one thing holding you back from mastering {topic}?
Why does {topic} seem so complicated when it really doesn't have to be?
shock: I can't believe people still do {topic} this way.
result_first: I made this in 4 minutes. Here's how.
This one change tripled my results with {topic}.
The before and after of {topic} will shock you.

open_loops: But the real game-changer comes in step {n}... we'll get there.
And wait until you see what happens when we combine these...
Keep watching because the last tip is the one that made the biggest difference.
I'll show you the exact tool in a second, but first...
The third tip is the one that actually matters, so stay until the end.
There's a reason I saved this for last...
pattern_interrupts: Now here's where it gets really interesting...
But hold on, there's a catch...
Wait, let me show you something...
Here's something no one tells you...
This next part is where most people mess up...
engagement_prompts: Let me know in the comments if you've tried this.
Type 'YES' in the comments if this resonates with you.
What would you add to this list? Drop it below.
Comment 'VIBE' if you want me to make a full tutorial on this.
Drop a comment with what you're working on. I read every single one.

music_presets.art_tutorial: lo-fi chill instrumental background music for creative art tutorial video
music_presets.tech_tutorial: minimal ambient electronic background music for tech tutorial
music_presets.motivation: uplifting inspirational orchestral background music for motivational video

music_presets.wellness: calm peaceful ambient meditation background music

music_presets.outro_jingle: mellow 10 second YouTube outro music with gentle fade
